regen.absent_element: reverting manual changes to default settings automatically
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically revert the power switch to its default state after the planned or default time period ends.

regen.absent_element: details on resuming default settings after manual changes
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically revert the state of the power switch to default settings after the planned or default time period ends, following any manual switch state changes.

regen.absent_element: default state resuming after the current time period ends
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically revert the power switch and appliance to the default state once the current time period ends.

label: When a manual set state of power ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: revert to the default setting after the manual set state ends
